thread.title: Uttar Pradesh: BSP leader Mohammed Shami shot dead in Allahabad district
thread.title_full: Uttar Pradesh: BSP leader Mohammed Shami shot dead in Allahabad district

author: FP Staff
title: Uttar Pradesh: BSP leader Mohammed Shami shot dead in Allahabad district
text:
Uttar Pradesh: BSP leader Mohammed Shami shot dead in Allahabad district FP Staff Mar, 20 2017 10:45:29 IST #Allahabad #Bahujan samaj party #Bharatiya janata party #Newstracker   
A Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) leader Mohammed Shami was shot dead in Allahabad on Sunday, hours   of new chief minister Yogi Adityanath. 
According to News Nation , BSP leader and former block head Shami was murdered while he was getting back home. Shami had recently shifted from Samajwadi Party to BSP. Representational image. AFP 
India Today reported that Shami was reportedly shot at by two unidentified gunmen who came on a motorbike. The incident took place in Allahabad's Mau Aima. Mohammed Shami was going towards his car parked outside his office when he was fatally shot. 
Sources said that he fell down immediately and the accused fled from the spot.The 60-year-old deceased was a local leader. 
Shami’s supporters protested after his murder on Sunday night. They blocked Allahabad-Faizabad highway for some time as well, according to News Nation . 
Mohammed Shami had been chosen as a block head from Allahabad’s Mau Aima a couple of times. Shami had recently joined Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) after leaving Samajwadi Party (SP), where he served for 20 years. 
In the recently concluded Uttar Pradesh Assembly elections, Shami had contested against six-time MLA from the Kunda constituency Raghuraj Pratap Singh alias Raja Bhaiya. 
Police have initiated the investigation into the matter. According to India Live Today , The police have put 2 teams along with crime branch to probe the case. A few people have also been detained and are being questioned. 
 40  45 am Top Stories
